reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?
reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that the app may collect User Provided and Automatically Collected Information, as well as information from surveys to assist in research, without asking for personal information.
reply.reference: We may disclose User Provided and Automatically Collected Information; The application allows users to take on surveys to assist research; When you fill our surveys, we will not ask you for personal information. URL: http://ggapps.net/privacy-policy/

system, the type of mobile Internet browsers you use, and information about the way you use the Application.
Research and surveys
The application allows users to take on surveys to assist research and help us better understand the efficiency of the platform and tools. When you fill our surveys, we will not ask you for personal information, and the information we collect will be completely anonymous. We will never share this information with commercial 3rd parties. reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The data collected includes the type of mobile device used, unique device ID, IP address, mobile operating system, type of mobile Internet browsers, and information on how the app is used.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy outlines the specific types of data collected by the application, including details about the mobile devices, operating systems, and browsing information.
reply.reference: The data collected includes the type of mobile device used, unique device ID, IP address, mobile operating system, type of mobile Internet browsers, and information on how the app is used. URL: http://ggapps.net/privacy-policy/

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly mentions that the purpose of data collection is to assist research, understand the efficiency of the platform and tools, and not for commercial use.
reply.reference: The application allows users to take on surveys to assist research and help us better understand the efficiency of the platform and tools. When you fill our surveys, we will not ask you for personal information, and the information we collect will be completely anonymous. We will never share this information with commercial 3rd parties. In case we offer the users to enter their email address during surveys, it is optional, and will only serve to provide users with feedback about their progress. URL: http://ggapps.net/privacy-policy/

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection by uninstalling the Application or by requesting to opt-out via email at privacy@ggapps.net. The user can also request the deletion of User Provided Data by contacting privacy@ggapps.net.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that users can opt out of data collection by uninstalling the application or by requesting to opt-out via email. Users can also request deletion of User Provided Data by contacting the provided email address.
reply.reference: You can stop all collection of information by the Application easily by uninstalling the Application. You may use the standard uninstall processes as may be available as part of your mobile device or via the mobile application marketplace or network. You can also request to opt-out via email, at privacy@ggapps.net. If you’d like us to delete User Provided Data that you have provided via the Application, please contact us at privacy@ggapps.net and we will respond in a reasonable time. Please note that some or all of the User Provided Data may be required in order for the Application to function properly. URL: http://ggapps.net/privacy-policy/

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app may share data with third parties as described in the privacy statement.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions that aggregated, anonymized data is periodically transmitted to external services to improve the application and service. It also states that user information may be shared with third parties as described in the privacy statement.
reply.reference: We will share your information with third parties only in the ways that are described in this privacy statement. URL: http://ggapps.net/privacy-policy/

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app shares data with trusted service providers who work on their behalf and have agreed to adhere to the rules set forth in the privacy statement.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions that the app shares data with trusted service providers who have agreed to follow the rules mentioned in the privacy statement.
reply.reference: with our trusted services providers who work on our behalf, do not have an independent use of the information we disclose to them, and have agreed to adhere to the rules set forth in this privacy statement. URL: http://ggapps.net/privacy-policy/
